D1:1: Audrey said:Hey Andrew! Good to see ya! What's been up since we last talked?

D1:19: Audrey said:Nice, spotting pretty birds while hiking must be great. Do you have any favorite hiking spots?

D1:21: Audrey said:Cool, gonna give it a try. Thanks for the suggestion!
D1:22: Andrew said:No problem! Let me know how you like it. Have fun hiking!
D1:23: Audrey said:Thanks! I'll let you know. Have a good one!
